entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the morning then becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
